title: Willie Cobb
text:
Willie Cobb was an American <a href="Negro%20league">Negro league</a> <a href="outfielder">outfielder</a> in the 1900s. 
Cobb played for the <a href="Cuban%20Giants">Cuban Giants</a> in 1908, and for the <a href="Birmingham%20Giants">Birmingham Giants</a> the following season. In six recorded games, he posted nine hits in 25 plate appearances.
